author: Adam Reiss
description: The defense team for Sean “Diddy” Combs has reached out to President Donald Trump seeking a pardon after his conviction on prostitution-related offenses, a source close to the legal team told NBC News on Tuesday
title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs has reached out to Trump about pardon, source says

description: Lawyers for Ghislaine Maxwell filed a request to block the government’s efforts to release grand jury transcripts in the investigation of Jeffrey Epstein. Meanwhile, a House Committee subpoenaed a group of prominent national figures to testify about Epstein, including Bill and Hillary Clinton. NBC News’ Kelly O’Donnell reports.
title: Maxwell opposes release of Epstein grand jury testimony

author: Phil Helsel
description: Four people were killed after the medical transport plane they were in crashed at an airport in the Navajo Nation in Arizona, police said
title: Four killed in medical transport plane crash in Arizona

author: Scott Wong
description: Republican Rep. Mike Flood faced boos at a town hall in Lincoln, Nebraska, on Monday, from voters protesting Trump's "big, beautiful bill."
title: A Republican got jeered at a town hall. He plans to hold more.

author: Tom Winter
description: Interested buyers need to put down a $10 million deposit in order to enter bidding for the 348 ft. yacht, which has 8 staterooms, a beauty salon and a pool.
title: Super bargain? U.S. auctioning off Russian oligarch's $325 million superyacht

description: President Donald Trump signed an executive order establishing a task force for the 2028 Olympic Games, which will be held in Los Angeles. Trump said the force will mobilize “the entire federal government to ensure the games are safe.”
title: Trump says 2028 Olympic task force will ‘ensure the games are safe’

author: Julie Tsirkin
description: Sen. Elissa Slotkin says Democrats should “go nuclear” to counter Republicans’ redistricting push in Texas and other red states and go on offense against Trump in general.
title: Michigan Sen. Elissa Slotkin urges fellow Democrats to 'go nuclear' in redistricting fight

author: The Politics Desk
description: The new congressional map proposed by Texas Republicans makes clear the party’s intent to pick up five new seats from the state in next year’s midterms.
title: How Texas' proposed map would affect the battle for the House: From the Politics Desk

author: Kayla Steinberg
description: Your midday matcha latte is getting more expensive and harder to come by as supply shortages and skyrocketing demand squeeze cafés
title: It's a real grind to meet matcha demand these days

description: A fight in Texas is brewing over the new congressional map proposed by Republicans. NBC News National Political Correspondent Steve Kornacki explains how the proposed congressional map could impact the balance of power in the House.
title: Steve Kornacki: Proposed congressional maps in Texas will let GOP ‘play offense’ in midterms

author: Chloe Atkins
description: Statistics released by the FBI on Tuesday show that violent crime decreased overall in the U.S. by 4.5% in 2024
title: FBI crime report says violent crime decreased by 4.5% in 2024

author: Rebecca Shabad
description: The State Department announced Tuesday that the program will first apply to visa applicants from Malawi and Zambia.
title: State Dept. unveils plan for some travelers to pay thousands before entering the U.S.

author: David K. Li
description: A bear briefly chased the mascot for pro hockey's Seattle Kraken in a furry faceoff before the grizzly goon let the sea troll skate away unharmed
title: Video captures moment Seattle Kraken mascot is chased by charging bear

author: Matt Lavietes
description: Ozzy Osbourne — the heavy metal rockstar turned reality television pioneer — died of a heart attack, his death certificate revealed, according to multiple reports
title: Ozzy Osbourne death certificate reveals rocker died of a heart attack: Reports

author: Nicole Acevedo
description: Sen. Jon Ossoff's office found "510 credible reports" of abuse against immigration detainees, according to a report first obtained by NBC News.
title: Hundreds of alleged human rights abuses in immigrant detention, report finds

author: Minyvonne Burke
description: A New Jersey state police lieutenant, who also served on Gov.
title: New Jersey police lieutenant accused of killing ex-girlfriend and her boyfriend in murder-suicide

description: Watch live coverage as the Texas House of Representatives convenes amid a standoff over a new congressional map. Democratic lawmakers have left the state in order to block the redistricting effort, which has prompted Gov. Greg Abbott to threaten them with expulsion if they do not return to establish a quorum.
title: Texas House reconvenes amid redistricting showdown

author: Kimmy Yam
description: A Purdue University student and daughter of a prominent New York priest who was detained during a visa hearing last week has been released.
title: ICE releases Purdue student who was abruptly detained at her visa hearing

author: Mirna Alsharif
description: Rod Stewart is facing criticism after an AI tribute video depicting Ozzy Osbourne taking selfies with other dead musicians was screened at his concert on Friday
title: Rod Stewart faces backlash for AI video of Ozzy Osbourne taking selfies with other dead musicians

author: Shannon Pettypiece
description: Meteorological data collected by some weather balloons has been halted.
title: How Trump is reshaping government data

description: The House Oversight Committee has issued subpoenas for former President Bill Clinton, former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton and several former top Justice Department officials for testimony in their ongoing investigation into Jeffrey Epstein. NBC News' Tom Winter reports on the individuals subpoenaed and what developments could come next amid calls for the release of information on Epstein.
title: House committee subpoenas Clintons and former DOJ officials for testimony on Epstein

author: Reuters
description: The United States and Rwanda have agreed for the African country to potentially accept hundreds of migrants deported from the U.S., the spokesperson for the Rwandan government and an official told Reuters toward immigration.
title: Rwanda says it reaches a deal with U.S. to take in up to 250 migrants

author: Syedah Asghar
description: The House committee investigating the Jeffrey Epstein case announced Tuesday that it issued subpoenas to former President Bill Clinton, former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton and several top former Justice Department officials for their testimony
title: House committee subpoenas the Clintons and former DOJ officials to testify on Epstein

author: Tim Stelloh
description: A murder suspect wanted in connection with the "targeted" July deaths of four people in Tennessee after a baby was discovered abandoned in a person’s front yard was captured after a multi-day manhunt.
title: Suspect wanted in targeted killings of 4 in Tennessee is captured after manhunt

author: Minyvonne Burke
description: Poor air quality from the Canadian wildfires remains a concern on Tuesday for much of the Upper Midwest and Northeast regions.
title: Poor air quality remains concern for Upper Midwest to Northeast amid Canadian wildfires

author: David K. Li
description: There were "multiple contributing factors" that led to the entirely "preventable" implosion of a submersible that cost five lives off the coast of Newfoundland two years ago, Coast Guard investigators said Tuesday
title: Titan submersible implosion that killed 5 was preventable, Coast Guard report says

author: Marlene Lenthang
description: Florida officials are warning the public about the risks of consuming raw milk after over 20 people have gotten sick
title: Florida officials warn about risks of drinking raw milk after 21 infections

description: Watch live coverage as President Trump signs an executive order on creating a White House Olympics task force to handle security and other issues ahead of the 2028 games.
title: Trump signs executive order on creating Olympics task force

author: Chloe Yang
description: Predators at a zoo in Denmark could soon be feasting on new donations from the public — their pets.
title: Zoo calls for unwanted pets to feed its animals

author: Alexander Smith
description: Ex-Russian President Dmitry Medvedev said his country’s withdrawal from the Intermediate Nuclear Forces Treaty presented a "new reality" for Moscow's enemies.
title: Russia's Medvedev warns enemies of 'new reality' as Kremlin ditches nuclear treaty

description: In an interview on CNBC, the president also said he took Scott Bessent off his shortlist for the open Federal Reserve governor role.
title: Trump says E.U. will face 35% tariff if it doesn’t invest $600B in the U.S.

description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is signaling that he plans to expand Israel’s military operations in Gaza with plans to occupy all of the strip. The escalation could complicate negotiations for the release of hostages. NBC’s Matt Bradley reports for TODAY.
title: Benjamin Netanyahu Pushes for Full Israeli Takeover of Gaza

author: Kaylah Jackson
description: The Texas House approved arrest warrants for Democrats who fled the state to block a GOP-favored redistricting plan.
title: Texas redistricting vote at a standstill after Democrats scatter: Morning Rundown

description: At a town hall event for Republican Congressman Mike Flood of Nebraska, anger erupted on a range of moves by the Trump administration, including the president’s economic agenda. A new poll shows American are concerned about the economy and rising prices, and Trump’s tariffs on dozens of countries could potentially raise the price of goods beyond just groceries. NBC’s Peter Alexander reports for TODAY.
title: Anger Erupts at Republican Town Hall Over Trump Economic Plan

author: Chantal Da Silva
description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is expected to push to "occupy all of the Gaza Strip" as ceasefire talks with Hamas founder and the hunger crisis in the besieged Palestinian enclave spirals.
title: Israel's Netanyahu expected to push for plan to 'occupy' Gaza

author: Erik Ortiz
description: A Tennessee death row inmate is scheduled to die by lethal injection Tuesday morning despite concerns from his lawyers that his heart device could repeatedly shock him and expose him to unconstitutional suffering
title: Tennessee man with heart device to be executed despite concerns it may shock him

author: Andrew Greif
description: Unlike most major sports, big paydays aren't the norm in track and field. It's why before Jacory Patterson won the U.S. 400-meter championship, he had to find a second job — and he's not alone.
title: He needed a graveyard shift at UPS to pay for training. Now he's a U.S. champion sprinter

author: Mithil Aggarwal
description: The U.S. and India’s blossoming friendship is at risk of falling to pieces, observers have warned, as President Donald Trump threatens to substantially increase tariffs on Indian goods over its purchases of Russian oil
title: Modi was ready to 'make India great again,' then Trump put America first

author: Jason Abbruzzese
description: It’s a slur for the AI age.
title: Is an AI backlash brewing? What 'clanker' says about growing frustrations with emerging tech

author: Astha Rajvanshi
description: Female and male travel influencers gain attention by gushing about visits to Afghanistan while one critic notes that their trips legitimize the "gender apartheid" in the country.
title: Travel influencers boost tourism to Taliban-run Afghanistan

author: Raquel Coronell Uribe
description: The Nebraska Republican held a town hall that started with boos from the crowd as he took the stage and ended with chants of “vote him out” when the event ended.
title: Nebraska Republican faces rowdy town hall with questions about Epstein files and fired BLS chief

author: NBC New York
description: A male model with a history of alleged domestic violence toward his husband was arraigned on charges of burglary and contempt of court over the weekend, accused of violating a protection order at the Harlem home when his partner was found dead
title: Model arrested after husband found stabbed to death in NYC apartment

author: The Associated Press
description: Brazil’s Supreme Court on Monday ordered the house arrest of former President Jair Bolsonaro, on trial for allegedly masterminding a coup plot to remain in office despite his defeat in the 2022 election.
title: Brazil’s Supreme Court orders the house arrest of former President Bolsonaro, a Trump ally

author: Michael Kosnar
description: Attorney General Pam Bondi has directed DOJ prosecutors to launch a grand jury investigation of whether Obama administration officials committed federal crimes when they assessed Russia's actions during the 2016 election.
title: Pam Bondi orders grand jury probe of Obama admin review of 2016 election
